verbose_text: A previous study reported that the ectopic expression of PEX11beta targets DLP1 to peroxisomes, implying that Pex11pbeta could recruit DLP1 to peroxisomes by interacting with Mff; however, Otera et al. reported that a Mff mutant in which the TMD was replaced with the plasma membrane targeted CAAX motif elicits the translocation of DLP1 to the plasma membrane, suggesting that Mff is sufficient to recruit DLP1 to target membranes.
evidence: Pex11pbeta could recruit DLP1 to peroxisomes
